==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ぼく|めつ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ほくめつ'}} compound {{m|zh|撲滅|tr=phuwk mjiet|lit=beat, strike + destroy}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''pok<sup>3</sup> mit<sup>6</sup>''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|ぼくめつ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ぼくめつ}}

# the [[beat out|beating out]] of a [[flame]], [[extinguishing]] by [[beating]]
# [[eradication]] or [[extermination]] by [[beating]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=ほくめつ'|figuratively}} the [[stamp out|stamping out]] or [[wipe out|wiping out]] of something

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|殲滅|せんめつ}}: [[annihilation]], to [[annihilate]] {{qualifier|emphasis on nothing being left}}
* {{ja-r|根絶|こんぜつ}}: [[extermination]], [[eradication]] {{qualifier|emphasis on removing something by the root}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=trans|ぼくめつ}}

# to [[beat out]] a [[flame]], to [[extinguish]] by [[beating]]
# to [[eradicate]] or [[exterminate]] something by [[beating]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=ほくめつ'|figuratively}} to [[stamp out]] something, to [[wipe out]] something
